Matthew__17.19__As a grain of mustard seed: That is, a perfect faith; which in its properties, and its fruits, resembles the grain of mustard seed, in the parable, Matthew 13:31.
Matthew__17.23__The didrachmas: A didrachma was half a sicle, or half a stater; that is, about 15 d. Englishwhich was a tax laid upon every head for the service of the temple.
